sentences.sContent: Cynthia’s still working on her thesis.
Their main thesis was that the rise in earnings was due to improvements in education.
sentences.sCn: 他们的主要论点是收入增加得益于教育状况的改善。

sentences.sContent: ...But finding hard evidence to support the thesis is not so easy...
...His main thesis is that the buzz of urban life...
...Ripley's thesis about sports falls apart in light of this fact...
...Knight moved on to do graduate work at Stanford University; his MBA thesis was on marketing athletic shoes...

trans.tranOther: a long piece of writing about a particular subject that you do as part of an advanced university degree such as an MA or a PhD
